response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is tailored to elevate your business or personal endeavors to new heights. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it has the potential to significantly impact your productivity and outcomes. Given its high value and exclusivity, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you, aiming to provide you with an opportunity to experience its benefits at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget.", "product_price": 12000}
